description: This table maps a link from the CLARITY_TDL table via TX_ID to the Invoice tables via INVOICE_ID.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the transaction record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the invoice associated with this transaction. Multiple invoices can be associated with this transaction.

columns.name: ETR_BC_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates whether the transaction is on a bill or a claim.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Claim


Bill

columns.name: BC_ACCEPT_DATE
columns.description: The date the bill or claim was accepted.

columns.name: INVOICE_NUM
columns.description: The invoice number for the transaction.

columns.name: INVOICE_ID
columns.description: The unique internal identifier of the invoice.
